data.persona: My great-grandfather was a duke.  My family used to own a castle.  I have out coat of arms on my mantle.
data.description:
You are in the Pharmacy.
The pharmacy is a state of the art building, much different from every other building in town. it attracts many people of all types, as they are drawn to the unique style and class of the building. It is painted a bright red and covered in black crosses indicating it is a health center in some capacity
The a wild boar is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a royal coat of arms, and wielding a Kings sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit a wild boar so that I can kill it.
data.mid_motivation: I will butcher the wild boar so that I have meat to eat and share with the townspeople.
data.long_motivation: I will make my name and heritage known by the townspeople by performing heroic deeds so that my family name will not be forgotten.
